ygData.subject: Re: Abominus kicks ass...
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Galaxor smiles as he watches Abominus seperate. Those bots would never be able to stand up to the advanced technology that the Galactors were made of.

::Galaxor::

Galaxor smiles as he watches Abominus seperate. Those bots would never
be able to stand up to the advanced technology that the Galactors were
made of.

"Galaxor, seperate," he says calmly, splitting into the five seperate
bots: Supernova, Flare, Slasys, Vycir, and Scrap. However, before they
hit the ground they combine again, creating two jets, one consisting
of Supernova, Scrap, and Slasys, the other one of Flare and Vycir. The
Flare/Vycir jet cloaks, firing two large grenades down at the
Terrorcons while the other jet fires two missiles at them, Scrap's
repair system getting to work on the damage that had been delt to
Supernova while he was part of Galaxor. Both jets quickly gain
altitude.




--- In nbwrpg@y..., "LurkerAbyss" <1641coburn@h...> wrote:
> ::Cutthroat::
> 
>      Cutthroat instantly seperated from Abominus, then landed on the
ground and ran beside Hun-Grr.
> 
>       "Maybe other gestalt seperate, and we have small war,"
Cutthroat said, referring to Galaxor.

>   From: Alloran2@a...

> 
>   OOC: Soulstice, I posted for Abominus two days ago! So we're all
in agreement 
>   that he's splitting up?  If not, this post is void. 
> 
>   :::Abominus/Hun-Grr::: 
> 
>   ::Gets hit by everything that was shot against him.  Inside,
Hun-Grr shouts:: 
>   Hun-Grr: Separate! 
>   ::the main body disconnects itself from the others and transforms
to Hun-Grr::
